title: laimpoy99
author: laimpoy99
content: *using Raspberry Pi Model 3 B+*using Bitmain Antminer U2*using Raspberry Pi OS Lite (64 bit)*using solo.ckpool.org*using cgminer*Download cgminer:wget http://ftp.debian.org/debian/pool/main/c/cgminer/cgminer_4.9.2-1+b2_arm64.deb*Install cgminersudo dpkg -i cgminer_4.9.2-1+b2_arm64.deb *If some dependencies are missing:sudo apt-get -f install*Start cgminer:sudo cgminer -o stratum+tcp://solo.ckpool.org:3333 -u BITCOIN_ADDRESS -p x

comments.author: laimpoy99
comments.body: This apply to for Raspberry Pi Model 3 A+ too.
